sources.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
sources.description: A lost city, a forbidden temple, an ancient curse, and the Three Mesquiteers make for one of the strangest westerns ever seen.

sources.title: The Riders of the Whistling Skull (1937)
sources.description: When Professor Marsh disappears while searching for the lost city of Lukachukai, his daughter enlists the help of the Three Mesquiteers. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-riders-of-the-whistling-skull-1937/

sources.title: The Riders of the Whistling Skull (1937) THE THREE MESQUITEERS
sources.description:
Stars: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune 
 Director: Mack V. Wright

 A supernatural western! The Three Mesquiteers accompany an archaeological expedition to a lost Indian city of gold called Lukachuke.

metadata.Plot: After a member of an archeological expedition is murdered, Stony convinces the other two reluctant Mesquiteers to accompany them. After another member is killed it becomes apparent that Rutledge and the Indian Otah are the culprits, but they are now in Indian territory without food and water.
metadata.Writer: Oliver Drake, John Rathmell, Bernard McConville
metadata.Actors: Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune
